subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Devils barely resemble last year’s fumbling team. They are tied with the first-place Rangers for 11th in the league in scoring, and they already have more power-play goals than last season.
snippet: The Devils barely resemble last year’s fumbling team. They are tied with the first-place Rangers for 11th in the league in scoring, and they already have more power-play goals than last season.
